text:
Its not just Redmond forcing unwanted UI changes on everyone during an update. 
Our Helpdesk has already received some calls about this after Google removed the
original workaround. Has anyone found an alternate way to add the bar back? 
Downloads bar gone from the bottom, downloads bubble flag gone as well. - Google
Chrome Community
 
BRIAN ILLNER 
| 
Senior Systems Administrator 
864.250.9227 Office 
864.679.2537 Fax 
Canal Insurance Company 
101 N. Main Street, Suite 400 
Greenville, SC 29601 
[cid:image001.jpg@01DA2113.60C290F0]

--

metadata.topic: Recent Chrome Updates remove Download bar workaround
